pages.title: Sapphire Armour
pages.text: To Make Infused Sapphire Armour you will need one Infused Sapphire per item you wish to make, a Diamond Piece of Armour matching that item and a Gem Upgrade Template.$(br)The Gem Upgrade Template goes in the First Slot, The Diamond Armour goes in the Second Slot and the Infused Sapphire goes in the Third Slot

pages.title: Sapphire Smithing
pages.text: Equip a Full set of Infused Sapphire Armour to Gain a Permenant Water Breathing Boost
